tk.giesecke.weatherstation

Class BGService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • tk.giesecke.weatherstation.BGService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.hardware.SensorEventListener

    public class BGService
extends android.app.Service
implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
    BGService background service to get hourly updates from the sensors and save them into the shared preferences
    Version:
    0.1 beta May 5, 2015.
    Author:
    Bernd Giesecke

      • addDayToDB

        private boolean addDayToDB(int timeStamp,
                 int dayStamp,
                 float currTemp,
                 float currPress,
                 float currHumid)
        Write measurements into data base gets all existing measurements, generates max, min and average values adds all values into data base
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - hour of measurement
        dayStamp - hour of measurement
        currTemp - measured temperature
        currPress - measured pressure
        currHumid - measured humidity
        Returns:
        boolean true - addDayToDB success false - addDayToDB failed

      • calculateAverage

        private double calculateAverage(java.util.List<java.lang.Float> marks)
        Calculate float average of all float entries in a list
        Parameters:
        marks - list we want to have the average from
        Returns:
        sum the average of all values in the list

      • onBind

        public android.os.IBinder onBind(android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: android.app.Service
        Return the communication channel to the service. May return null if clients can not bind to the service. The returned IBinder is usually for a complex interface that has been described using aidl.

        Note that unlike other application components, calls on to the IBinder interface returned here may not happen on the main thread of the process. More information about the main thread can be found in Processes and Threads.

        Specified by:
        onBind in class android.app.Service
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent that was used to bind to this service, as given to Context.bindService. Note that any extras that were included with the Intent at that point will not be seen here.
        Returns:
        Return an IBinder through which clients can call on to the service.
